about_the_game:
For hundreds of years, the elders have spoken of a unique city, made entirely of gold, hidden from the world for 500 years; according to legend, there is only one map, which was separated into parts and hidden all over the world. This is how hundreds of brave men and women began their search, braving the unknown, in the fantastic world of Sea of Brave.

Sea of Brave Beast Island is a turn-based, tactical deck-building roguelike game for one player. Join Aidan on his perilous adventure on Benryu Island, defeating Captain Kingg's minions to uncover his secrets. Create a unique deck by discovering new cards, allies, or improving your deck through each battle.

Characteristics:

• Dynamic deck building: Discover a wide variety of cards to combine in your various battles.

• Strategic Battles: Carefully choose your cards each turn, boosting your attacks or fiercely defending your position to defeat the enemy. Don't let them capture you!

• Maximize Synergies: Combine cards to boost your defense and attack.

• Unique game generation: Island maps change with every attempt as each map in each chapter is randomly generated.

• Find Allies: Discover and find allies in your adventure, unlocking their unique cards that you can use in your battles.

• Accessories: Enhance your games with a wide variety of accessories to boost your skills with extraordinary effects.
